# Dental City â€” Practice Management Dashboard
## Full Proposal
*February 2026 â€” Prepared by Sagemind AI*

---

## 1. Executive Summary

Sagemind AI proposes building a custom practice management dashboard for Dental City Costa Rica, integrated directly into their existing website. The system will handle appointment booking, employee scheduling, AI-powered payment tracking with receipt scanning, and income reporting â€” all behind a secure employee login with role-based access.

**Key Highlights:**
- Built on top of the existing Next.js website â€” no new platforms to learn
- AI-powered receipt scanning â€” snap a photo, data auto-fills
- Fully bilingual (EN/ES)
- Near-zero infrastructure costs ($0â€“$20/mo on free tiers)
- No monthly software subscriptions required

---

## 2. What We're Building

### Features Overview

| Feature | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| **Employee Portal** | Secure login with role-based access (Admin, Doctor, Staff) |
| **Appointment Booking** | Patient-facing booking widget + admin calendar view |
| **Employee Scheduling** | Admin assigns shifts, employees view schedules, clock in/out |
| **Payment Tracking** | Log payments per doctor, per payment method â€” with AI receipt scanning |
| **AI Receipt Scanner** | Snap a photo of any receipt â†’ AI extracts amount, date, payment type â†’ auto-fills the form |
| **Income Reports** | Dashboard with charts, filters by doctor/date/type, CSV/PDF export |
| **Bilingual UI** | Full EN/ES support throughout the dashboard |

---

### Tech Stack

| Component | Technology | Why |
|-----------|-----------|-----|
| **Frontend** | Next.js (already in use) | No new tech, consistent with existing site |
| **Database** | Supabase (PostgreSQL) | Free tier is generous, built-in auth, real-time, Row Level Security |
| **Authentication** | Supabase Auth + RBAC | Role-based: Admin, Doctor, Staff |
| **Booking** | Cal.com (open-source, self-hosted) | Free, built with Next.js, HIPAA-capable |
| **Receipt AI** | Claude Vision API | Best accuracy on varied/messy receipts, native Spanish support |
| **Hosting** | Vercel (frontend) + Supabase (backend) | Both have free tiers, scales easily |
| **Storage** | Supabase Storage | Receipt images stored securely |

---

## 4. Detailed Feature Breakdown

### Module 1: Authentication & Employee Portal

Secure login system with role-based permissions.

| Feature | Description | Effort |
|---------|-------------|--------|
| Login/logout UI | Email + password authentication | 1 day |
| Supabase Auth + RBAC setup | Three roles: Admin, Doctor, Staff | 1 day |
| User management | Admin can add/edit/deactivate users | 1 day |
| Profile pages | Name, role, photo, contact info | 0.5 day |
| Password reset | Self-service password recovery | 0.5 day |
| **Subtotal** | | **4 days** |

**Role Permissions:**

| Action | Admin | Doctor | Staff |
|--------|-------|--------|-------|
| View dashboard | âœ… | âœ… | âœ… |
| Enter payments | âœ… | âœ… | âœ… |
| Scan receipts | âœ… | âœ… | âœ… |
| View all income reports | âœ… | Own only | âŒ |
| Edit/delete payments | âœ… | âŒ | âŒ |
| Manage schedules | âœ… | View own | View own |
| Manage users | âœ… | âŒ | âŒ |
| Manage appointments | âœ… | âœ… | âœ… |

### Module 2: Appointment Booking

Patient-facing booking integrated with the website + admin management.

| Feature | Description | Effort |
|---------|-------------|--------|
| Cal.com self-hosted setup | Open-source scheduling infrastructure | 2 days |
| Service type configuration | Cleaning, implant, consult, orthodontics, etc. | 0.5 day |
| Doctor/provider selection | Patients choose which doctor to see | 0.5 day |
| WhatsApp notification | Alert on new bookings via WhatsApp | 0.5 day |
| Admin calendar view | See all appointments across doctors | 1 day |
| Appointment status management | Confirmed, completed, cancelled, no-show | 0.5 day |
| **Subtotal** | | **5 days** |

### Module 3: Employee Scheduling & Time Tracking

Admin creates schedules, employees track their hours.

| Feature | Description | Effort |
|---------|-------------|--------|
| Schedule builder | Admin assigns shifts per doctor/staff member | 2 days |
| Weekly/monthly calendar view | Visual schedule for the whole clinic | 1 day |
| Clock in/out | Employee self-service time tracking | 1 day |
| Hours summary | Per-employee hours worked by period | 1 day |
| **Subtotal** | | **5 days** |

### Module 4: Payment Tracking + AI Receipt Scanner

The core value module â€” log payments with minimal effort.

| Feature | Description | Effort |
|---------|-------------|--------|
| Payment entry form | Amount, doctor, payment type, date, patient name, notes | 1 day |
| Payment types | Cash, card (per reader/doctor), bank transfer, insurance | 0.5 day |
| ğŸ“¸ Camera/upload UI | "Snap Receipt" button, opens camera or file picker | 0.5 day |
| ğŸ¤– Claude Vision integration | Send receipt image â†’ receive structured JSON | 1 day |
| Receipt parsing & prompt engineering | Optimized for CR receipts (Spanish, varied formats) | 0.5 day |
| Auto-fill + review flow | AI data populates form, employee reviews & confirms | 0.5 day |
| Receipt image storage | Original photo saved and linked to payment record | 0.5 day |
| Daily payment log | Filterable by doctor, date, payment type | 1 day |
| Edit/delete payments | Admin only | 0.5 day |
| **Subtotal** | | **6 days** |

**How Receipt Scanning Works:**

```
ğŸ“± Employee Flow (10 seconds total):

1. Open Payment Entry page on phone
2. Tap "ğŸ“¸ Scan Receipt"
3. Camera opens â†’ snap photo of receipt
4. â³ 2-3 second AI processing
5. Form auto-fills:
   â€¢ Amount: â‚¡45,000
   â€¢ Date: Feb 25, 2026
   â€¢ Payment type: Credit Card
   â€¢ (Other details from receipt)
6. Select doctor from dropdown
7. Tap "Save" âœ…

Done. No typing needed.
```

**What the AI extracts:**
- Total amount (handles colones â‚¡ and USD $)
- Date and time
- Payment method (card type, cash, transfer)
- Card last 4 digits (if visible)
- Any line items / service descriptions
- Receipt/transaction number

### Module 5: Income Reports

Visual dashboard with filtering and export.

| Feature | Description | Effort |
|---------|-------------|--------|
| Dashboard overview | Today's income, this week, this month, YTD | 1 day |
| Income by doctor | Bar/pie charts showing revenue per provider | 1 day |
| Income by payment type | Breakdown: cash vs card vs transfer vs insurance | 0.5 day |
| Date range filtering | Custom date picker for any period | 0.5 day |
| Export to CSV/PDF | Downloadable reports for accounting | 1 day |
| **Subtotal** | | **4 days** |

### Module 6: Bilingual Support

| Feature | Description | Effort |
|---------|-------------|--------|
| i18n setup for dashboard | Reuse existing EN/ES system from website | 0.5 day |
| Translate all dashboard strings | All labels, buttons, messages in Spanish | 1 day |
| **Subtotal** | | **1.5 days** |

---

## 5. Effort Summary

| Module | Days |
|--------|------|
| 1. Auth & Employee Portal | 4 |
| 2. Appointment Booking | 5 |
| 3. Employee Scheduling & Time Tracking | 5 |
| 4. Payment Tracking + AI Receipt Scanner | 6 |
| 5. Income Reports | 4 |
| 6. Bilingual Support | 1.5 |
| Testing, QA & Polish | 3 |
| **Total** | **28.5 days** |

---

## 6. Timeline

### Option A: Single Delivery (~9 weeks)

| Phase | Duration | Deliverables |
|-------|----------|-------------|
| **Phase 1** | Week 1â€“2 | Auth + Employee Portal + Database Setup |
| **Phase 2** | Week 3â€“4 | Payment Tracking + AI Receipt Scanner |
| **Phase 3** | Week 5â€“6 | Income Reports + Appointment Booking |
| **Phase 4** | Week 7â€“8 | Employee Scheduling + Bilingual |
| **Phase 5** | Week 9 | Testing, polish, revisions, launch |

### Option B: Two-Phase Delivery (Recommended)

Deliver immediate value first, then complete the system.

| Phase | Duration | Deliverables | Value |
|-------|----------|-------------|-------|
| **Phase A** | 4â€“5 weeks | Auth + Payment Tracking + Receipt Scanner + Income Reports | They can start tracking money immediately |
| **Phase B** | 4 weeks | Booking + Employee Scheduling + Time Tracking | Completes the full system |

---

## 7. Pricing

### Full Build (All Modules)

| Item | Price |
|------|-------|
| All 6 modules including AI receipt scanning | $9,000â€“$13,500 |
| Cal.com integration for booking | Included |
| Claude Vision API integration | Included |
| Bilingual EN/ES | Included |
| 2 rounds of revisions per phase | Included |
| 30 days post-launch support | Included |

### Phased Pricing

| Phase | Modules | Price |
|-------|---------|-------|
| **Phase A** | Auth + Payment Tracking + Receipt Scanner + Reports | $5,000â€“$7,000 |
| **Phase B** | Booking + Scheduling + Time Tracking | $4,000â€“$5,500 |
| **Total** | All modules | **$9,000â€“$12,500** |

### Ongoing Maintenance

| Package | Includes | Price |
|---------|----------|-------|
| **Essential** | Hosting, backups, bug fixes, uptime monitoring | $149/mo |
| **Growth** | Essential + feature updates (3 hrs/mo), analytics, priority support | $299/mo |

### Infrastructure Costs (Client Pays)

| Service | Cost | Notes |
|---------|------|-------|
| Supabase | $0/mo | Free tier covers small clinics (500MB DB, 1GB storage) |
| Vercel | $0â€“$20/mo | Existing hosting |
| Cal.com | $0/mo | Self-hosted, open-source |
| Claude Vision API | ~$5â€“15/mo | ~$0.01â€“0.05 per receipt scan |
| **Total** | **$5â€“$35/mo** | |

### Payment Schedule

| Milestone | Amount | When |
|-----------|--------|------|
| Project kickoff | 30% | Upon contract signing |
| Phase A delivery | 35% | Upon Phase A completion & approval |
| Phase B delivery | 25% | Upon Phase B completion & approval |
| Final sign-off | 10% | Upon full launch & 7-day testing period |

---

## 8. Scope Boundaries

### What's Included âœ…

- Employee portal with secure authentication
- AI-powered receipt scanning and payment logging
- Income reports and dashboards
- Appointment booking (Cal.com integration)
- Employee scheduling and time tracking
- Bilingual EN/ES interface
- Mobile-responsive design (works on phone/tablet/desktop)
- 30 days post-launch support

### What's NOT Included âŒ

- Patient clinical records / dental charting
- Insurance billing or claims processing
- Direct hardware integration with card readers
- Payroll calculation or tax reporting
- Expense tracking (can be added later)
- Inventory management (can be added later)
- Native mobile app (web app works on all devices)

### Future Add-Ons (Available as Separate Projects)

| Feature | Estimated Cost |
|---------|---------------|
| Expense tracking module | $2,000â€“$3,000 |
| Inventory management | $2,500â€“$4,000 |
| Patient portal (view appointments, history) | $3,000â€“$5,000 |
| Automated payment reminders (WhatsApp/SMS) | $1,000â€“$2,000 |
| Multi-location support | $2,000â€“$3,000 |
| Native mobile app | $8,000â€“$15,000 |

---

## 9. Why Sagemind AI

| Factor | Detail |
|--------|--------|
| **We built your website** | We know your brand, your tech, your business |
| **AI expertise** | Receipt scanning powered by state-of-the-art AI vision |
| **Bilingual** | Native EN/ES support already proven |
| **Full-stack** | Design, development, AI, deployment â€” one team |
| **Low overhead** | No monthly software licenses, built on free/open-source tools |
| **Costa Rica aware** | We understand the payment methods, currency, and local context |
| **Scalable** | System grows with you â€” add features as needs evolve |

---

## 10. Next Steps

1. **Review this proposal** and provide feedback
2. **Confirm scope** â€” any features to add, remove, or adjust priority?
3. **Choose delivery option** â€” Single delivery or phased approach?
4. **Sign agreement** and schedule kickoff
5. **Kickoff call** â€” gather requirements, access credentials, sample receipts for AI training
